short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarise and Translate any webpage into any language at the click of a button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learnify is your AI-powered language learning sidekick that summarises and translates the content of any webpage into the language of your choice. You are also provided the option of choosing the difficulty of the translated text.

Please reload any webpage you which to use Learnify on after installing the extension.
